channel.title: I Need Help With Hamachi Plz
channel.description: Ok, I've downloaded the hamachi at hamachi.cc and I typed in servername and password and I get a list of users on the server. Now how do I play on the server?

item.title: I Need Help With Hamachi Plz
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Ice Age Elmo:

So, I just use the normal moparscape client? [br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 05:51:18 PM[/size][hr]And put in the server IP+Port?

Yepp, just have the hamachi Name and Password put in on hamachi

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help With Hamachi Plz

item.title: I Need Help With Hamachi Plz
item.dc:creator: @free_4_all_kill free 4 all kill
item.description:
@free_4_all_kill wrote:

just move ur mouse over the server name and it’ll show u the IP and thats wat u gotta type in. Also see if ur using the right port

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help With Hamachi Plz

item.title: I Need Help With Hamachi Plz
item.dc:creator: @l_m_a_o1 l m a o
item.description:
@l_m_a_o1 wrote:

zezi111:

All you have to do is add the server on hamachi like you did and then find the port and IP of the server and click logg in. If it doesn’t work, servers down.

either its down, or the network’s full which in that case try using a diffrent network(if there are more)

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help With Hamachi Plz
item.dc:creator: @Ruvio Ruvio
item.description:
@Ruvio wrote:

Get the IP and port of the server you’re playing. E.G 0mfgscape1 - pass 123 = step one of the server. step 2 is the IP and port = 5.114.48.117 and 43594

Read full topic
